game_info.name: Pirateers Clone
game_info.description: Top-down pirate naval combat. Control ship with A/D to turn, W/S for speed. Fire broadside cannons with Space. Destroy enemies, collect loot, survive the day.

core_loop.description: Start day -> Sail and fight enemies -> Collect loot -> Survive until day ends or return to base -> Upgrade ship -> Repeat

movement.description: A/D turn left/right, W/S increase/decrease speed

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Position ship broadside to enemy, press Space to fire cannons from both port and starboard
combat_profile.enemy_approach: Enemies patrol and attack when in range

key_features.name: Broadside Combat
key_features.test_method: Space fires cannons from both sides of ship

key_features.name: Ship Movement
key_features.test_method: A/D turns ship, W/S controls speed

key_features.name: Day Timer
key_features.test_method: Timer counts down, day ends when expired

key_features.name: Loot Collection
key_features.test_method: Destroyed ships drop loot, collect by sailing over
